pubspec.name: cubit
pubspec.description: Cubit is a lightweight state management solution. It is a subset of the bloc package that does not rely on events and instead uses methods to emit new states.

pubspec.name: cubit
pubspec.description: An experimental Dart library which expose a cubit. A cubit is a reimagined bloc (from package:bloc) which removes events and relies on methods to emit new states instead.
